Description: Stunningly renovated four bedroom two bathroom located in Malden. You will love the attention to detail that has been put into this home! This single-family house features a luxurious eat-in kitchen, stainless steel appliances, a gas stove top, alluring wooden cabinetry finishes, granite countertops, hardwood flooring throughout, ambient lighting, spacious bedrooms, and two desirable bathrooms. 4 Parking spots available big driveway Available 9/1 No pets!
